sentences.en: AGENT LANDAU: ( on radio ) Bunkhouse. We're in the dorm.
sentences.cn: 蓝道探员: ( 对讲机中 ) 舍. 我们在宿舍.

sentences.en: And I'll give you half if you help me get out of this dorm!
sentences.cn: 如果你帮我离开这儿我就分你一半!

sentences.en: Are you going to live in the student's dorm or at home?
sentences.cn: 你打算住学校寝室还是住家里?

sentences.en: But I had no food in my dorm, so I had to go to canteen.
sentences.cn: 但是我在宿舍没有东西可吃，所以我只能去餐厅了。

sentences.en: Could you tell the girls in your dorm about the party?
sentences.cn: 你能不能告诉你宿舍的女孩子有关聚会的事?

sentences.en: First year college students usually live in a dorm.
sentences.cn: 大学新生通常住在宿舍里.

sentences.en: I love the dorm and I miss them, my roommates.
sentences.cn: 我爱宿舍,并且,我对他们不在感到寂寞, 我的同房间的伙伴.

sentences.en: I saw her around campus occasionally - she lived in the same dorm as a girl I dated that year, but nothing noteworthy ever really happened.
sentences.cn: 我偶尔会在学校里看到她——她跟我那年交往的一个女孩住在同一个宿舍，但是从来没发生过什么值得注意的事。

sentences.en: I saw the whole thing from my Cornell dorm room.
sentences.cn: 我在我在康奈尔的寝室看了正常比赛.

sentences.en: I want to move out of this dorm.
sentences.cn: 我想搬出宿舍.

sentences.en: If some problems occur in your dorm, how do you solve them?
sentences.cn: 室友之间有了矛盾, 你们怎么解决?

sentences.en: If you have a phone in your dorm or apartment, a cell phone, and any other phone numbers, consolidate them into one number with Google Voice.
sentences.cn: 如果你有宿舍或公寓的号码、手机号码，还有其他什么电话号码，可以通过谷歌声音把它们集成为一个号码。

sentences.en: In most universities, males and females live in the same dorm.
sentences.cn: 在大部分高校, 男生和女生住在相同的宿舍里.

sentences.en: My dorm always has the best parties.
sentences.cn: 我的宿舍总是有最好的派对。

sentences.en: Neither does anyone else in this dorm, so who cares?
sentences.cn: 这个宿舍其他人也不说, 管这么多 呢 ?

sentences.en: So, some can stay in the dorm for an entire month without talking at all with anyone.
sentences.cn: 因此，有些学生能待在宿舍里整整一个月不与任何人讲话。

sentences.en: The air of the dorm was as cold as frost.
sentences.cn: 压抑的气氛似乎将整个宿舍置于愁云惨雾之中.

sentences.en: The manager of the dorm takes good care of us.
sentences.cn: 宿舍的管理员给我们无微不至的关怀.

sentences.en: The most exciting scene may be the birthday party held in dorm.
sentences.cn: (最令人兴奋的是在宿舍为某人过生日. )

sentences.en: Tomorrow is Sunday. I will clean my dorm thoroughly.
sentences.cn: 明天是星期天. 我要好好整理一下儿我的宿舍.
